group_1.textRight: With this...[chara:304000:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:304000:lipSynch_1][flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3040A03][chara:304000:motion_400]The curtain falls!!
*Sigh*... It's over...
Yep, thanks to how you attacked the enemies'@commander.
That's what opened a window for us.
Yeah, yeah!
If it weren't for you, Kira-senpai...
We would've kept struggling to deal blows, and@might've had to retreat.
Nice job noticing that, Kira.
Uh, Kira? Don't tell me...
You just charged ahead without thinking?

group_1.textLeft: There was a single Familiar separated from the@rest...
So I just tried to attack it and see what@happened.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303900:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Really? That casually?!
*Sigh*...
That *is* how Kira's always been...
Always careful and discreet, right up until@she suddenly acts on a whim.
What literature mode are you in now, by the@way?

group_1.textLeft: Bakin. His collected diaries are quite@interesting...

group_1.textRight: ...That's already different from this@morning?
I see... Kira-senpai's the type to act@according to her mood.
But all the same...@No, honestly, *because* of that...
You can make breakthroughs in bad situations@like the one we had today, don't you think?
...Yep, it is!
Yeah, I agree that it's a good quality.
I observe the enemies...
Followed by Mihono devising a strategy and@taking charge.
And if the situation changes, Kira's flexible@and resourceful enough to create an opening.
We make a pretty good team, don't you think?
Indeed!

group_1.textLeft: Though with roles like that, it kind of feels@like...
...There's going to be a lot of pressure on me@whenever we're faced with an unknown situation?
But I do agree that our team's not half bad.

group_1.textRight: ...It looks like our efforts are bearing fruit,@just like Yakumo-san said.
That they are! So, let's keep our guard up until@the end...
And press onward!
